titleStmt.title: The first part of Ieronimo With the warres of Portugall, and the life and death of Don Andræa.
titleStmt.author: Kyd, Thomas, 1558-1594. Spanish tragedy.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By William Jaggard] for Thomas Pauyer, and are to be solde at his shop, at the entrance into the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Although this play purports to be a precursor to "The Spanish tragedie", Thomas Kyd is probably not the author.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the entrance into the Exchange
